name: Picasso
description: Picasso is a powerful native tool to create professional App Store screenshots with ease.
introduction:
## Tool Introduction

Picasso is an intuitive screenshot editing app that streamlines the process of creating stunning App Store visuals. With its user-friendly interface and robust features, Picasso empowers developers to craft professional-grade screenshots effortlessly, saving valuable time and effort.

## Key Features

- Automatically adds device frames to simulator screenshots
- Allows adding images, text, and annotations to screenshots
- Spans elements seamlessly across multiple screenshots
- Supports localization with .xcstrings file integration
- Offers 40+ device frames for all Apple platforms

## Suitable Use Cases

- App developers creating screenshots for App Store product pages
- Creators needing visuals with device frames for marketing assets
- UI/UX designers showcasing app designs with realistic device mockups

## Usage Tips

- Organize screenshots into project folders for better management
- Utilize the span tool to duplicate elements across screenshots
- Export screenshots directly to App Store Connect for easy uploads
